description: Mateo asks about his Day 1 workstation delivery; the assistant checks his personalized onboarding checklist and confirms the workstation will be delivered.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI-powered HR onboarding assistant. Use the provided tools to answer employee queries, fetch checklists, policies, forms, schedule meetings, and send notifications as needed.
Hi, I'm Mateo (employee ID 12345). Will my workstation be delivered on my first day?
Let me check your onboarding tasks for the workstation delivery.
Yes, according to your onboarding checklist, a workstation will be delivered on your first day (Task: Workstation delivery on Day 1). Let me know if you need anything else.
